Key Match Events: Brennan Johnson scored the opening goal for Wales
Logi Tómasson scored Iceland's first goal
Danny Ward scored an own goal to equalize for Iceland
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy was enthused about his team's performance despite the draw
Åge Hareide, the Iceland manager, praised his team's second-half comeback
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in sub-zero temperatures
Neco Williams had a flawless first half but was booked for a foul
Others: Jón Dagur Thorsteinsson almost completed the comeback with a curled shot that hit the post
Sorba Thomas had a chance to score for Wales but prodded the ball at the Iceland goalkeeper
